ygData.msgSnippet: DarkMouse:: She fired on FoxFingers. KitKat, WE got an intruder in the base! ... make ... thier ... mirror chips ... chip ... him. He ... knew he ... smart,

DarkMouse::

She fired on FoxFingers. "KitKat, WE got an intruder in the base!"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> message 1
> 
> Foxfingers heard Darkmouses shout. He ducked close to the wall to 
make
> himself a smaller target. He scanned for autoguns and when he found 
thier
> location. Quickly transforming to bot mode  he slid a series of 
mirror chips
> across the floor.(Another thief trick I learned in other RPGs) Each 
chip
> would identify itself as him so the autoguns wouldn't get a lock on 
him. He
> knew he'd screwed up, letting his curiosity get the best of him. He 
knew he
> was safe though, Curiosity only kills cats, and he's a fox.
> 
> 
> >DarkMouse::
> She still held the gun at close range at FoxFinger. She knew the
> autoguns were on him.  She smiled. "You know, your either very 
smart,
> or very stupid. Your in KitKat's base now. So, what are you doing
> here?"
> 
> Message 2
> "Getting away I hope." Foxfingers yelps as he  dove to the ground 
sliding
> past Darkmouse. He hoped that his mirror chips would confuse the 
autoguns.
> if they didn't then the autoguns would have to go through Darkmouse 
to hit
> him.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Sent: Monday, October 30, 2000 6:37 AM
> Subject: Re: Foxfingers
> 
> 
> > (Sorry, I thought Starscream had gone to intercept FoxFingers.  No
> > matter, it shall be taken care of.)
> >
> > DarkMouse::
> > She looked at the monitor with KitKat and the other bot. Then a 
small
> > red light started flashing. She looked at the other screen and 
saw a
> > bot trying to sneek in. She grinned,"Oh it looks like I'll have a
> > little fun today after all." She got up and looked at 
Drillbit. "YOu
> > stay here and tell me what I miss on the conversation. I'll be 
right
> > back."
> >
> > She drew her pistol and walked out. She went down the hallway and
> > towards the entrance. She stopped just around the corner from the
> > other bot. She heard his foot falls get sloser. She raised her gun
> > and jumped out from behind the corner, aiming at the intruder.
> > "FREEZE OR YOUR DEAD! AUTOGUNS! TAKE AIM!"
> > The autoguns aimed at FoxFingers, but waited for the command to 
fire.
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Foxfingers reached the side of Destructors ship. he found an
> > airvent leading
> > > inside. (Since bots are coming and going the shields must be 
down.)
> > he
> > > scanned the vent to see if it went all the way through. it did 
and
> > was large
> > > enough for him to squeeze through in beast mode. The bot
> > transformed to fox
> > > and slid into the ship.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
